Korlessa was a dragonborn bard that lived in Baldurs Gate some time during or after the late 14 century DR.Information about Korlessa included in the prompt given to the artist was shared on [https//web.archive.org/web/20230125141721/https//www.muddycolors.com/2022/06/korlessa-scale-singer/ their blog]
Korlessa had the powers of a spellsinger, unique spellcasters that accessed their magic by means of song or dance. Her music attracted small, spectral dragons wherever she played.
